description: Good little card game. Very tense at moments, a lot of the tension comes from anticipating what card you will draw. Overall I really like it for what it is. Feels very Knizia.
One of our favourite two player games at the moment, probably because it's short and sweet and doesn't need too much thought.

Very fast 2-player game but can be frustrating when you just can't get the point cards you need after scoring an expedition. Because 1/4 of the cards are wager cards, you can end up with a lot of them instead of point cards. Good game if you go into it knowing you could very well end up with negative points.
One of my favourite two player games. If you haven't played it you should.
Good 2-player game, simple mechanics so easy to learn but lots to think about when trying to outplay your opponent.  Nice art, nice inoffensive theme that doesn’t really matter but nice eye candy.

title: Fun little...
description: Fun little 2-player card game of risk vs. reward.  Your goals must not be spread out over too many excavations, as there is only a limited amount of cards shared by both players.  Quick game, but drawback is it's only 2-player (well, unless you buy another copy of the game).  One mechanic I like is that you must either play OR discard a card on your turn. Your opponent can then choose to take the card you discarded.  I also like how the game is light, small and easy to set up and plays quickly.

title: A fun game...
description: A fun game, though it's lacking in a little bit of depth.  Although my wife destroys me at this all the time, so that might be why I'm not enthralled at this game.

title: I've never...
description: I've never felt such intense personal hatred from a game. I don't hate it back, but until it can find it in its heart to let me beat my wife just ONCE, I refuse to raise its rating.

title: This seems...
description: This seems very luck driven at first, but there is a surprising amount of strategy involved.  It can get pretty mathy at times so I recommend downloading the free Lost Cities scoring app. It makes scoring very easy

title: Having pla...
description: Having played numerous games, most of which online, I think it's fair to say that this is one of my favourite two player games. The rules are very simple and the luck factor is definitely there (as you draw cards and have to play one each turn), but it is certainly a game where some skill is involved. You try to focus on a few colours, as you pay 20 points for every colour you start. However, you don't want to show early on which colours you'll be playing, trying to entice your opponent to throw out the card you need.I'm a fan of Knizia's work and this game is certainly one of my favourites, although Euphrate & Tigris and -to a lesser extent- Genius are also very enjoyable.

title: Quick, fun...
description: Quick, fun game, where you're regularly confronted with extremely tough decisions. My wife regularly kicks my butt in this game!

title: Wife likes...
description: Wife likes it and kicks my ass with it.  Also good for a 2-man bar night.  My cards are getting very worn through repeated plays.  I've definitely played more than 11 times, but many of these were before I discovered BGG and started recording plays.

title: Bland
description: Bland

title: I like the...
description: I like the "feel" of this game.  It's good for what it is, but it has a hard time competing against more thematic games.

title: Great two player travel card game.
description: Easy to learn and easy to teach.

title: 60 lamorac...
description: 60 lamorac

title: Very fun r...
description: Very fun relaxing two player game that can cause tension, but not super stressful.  At first, can be a little mathy when adding up the scores, but once you get the hang of it can be really fun.  Definitely a lighter game that you need to play multiple times in order to build a strategy for the game.  love playing this game with my girlfriend who tends to kill me everytime.

title: Excelent! ...
description: Excelent! Is the best game for playing with the family! We all love it!

title: Fun, prett...
description: Fun, pretty quick 2 player.  Make use of the board to temporarily stash cards you want back.  That's how my friend beats me all the time.

title: Very nice ...
description: Very nice gateway game, and a good way to fill a bit of time. Surprisingly agonizing and cutthroat. Can get a bit boring after a while; just don't overdo it.

title: Simple, ye...
description: Simple, yet addictive.  Very fast play and very easy rules.

title: Just learn...
description: Just learned this on BSW.  What a great, quick playing card game!  Great for a short break, or for a longer points contest.

title: 2/26/18: G...
description: 2/26/18: Great, quick 2 player game and easy to set up. This will rotate with Jaipur

title: Quick, Kni...
description: Quick, Knizia, and the kids enjoy it. Thus, I enjoy it.

title: The couple...
description: The couple's champion game hits yet another home!!

title: Apart from...
description:
Apart from the simple rules I don't understand why this is the "definitive couples game"
There is quite a bit of math to work out return on expeditions, you don't really have to talk to your opponent at all, and there is no difficulty in holding back cards you can see your opponent wants simply to make it harder for them.
